create_content.description: Generate posts including videos, carousels, images, quotes, and memes.

props.name: brand_id
props.description: Unique identifier of your brand. Find it in Predis.ai under your brand settings.

props.name: text
props.description: The topic for your post. Must be at least 20 characters and 3 words.

props.name: model_version
props.description: Version 4 offers higher quality but only supports single_image and carousel.

props.name: media_type
props.description: Type of media to generate. Video is only supported by model version 2.

props.name: post_type
props.description: Type of post to generate. Only supported by model version 2.

props.name: video_duration
props.description: Required when media type is video.

props.name: author
props.description: Author name. Required when post type is quotes.

props.name: template_ids
props.description: List of template IDs to use. Only supported by model version 2.

props.name: media_urls
props.description: List of image/video URLs to use in your post. Only supported by model version 2.

post_created.description: Triggers when a post generation completes or fails.
